1.content:
You are just leaving acme looniversity when you hear the voice of your worst nightmare behind you “ooooh, what a cute Wittle bunny wunny” you try to run but she grabs your ears, looks at you and says “you’re gonna be my new baby dolly forever and ever and ever” as she carries you out of sight of everyone, you put your finger in her face and say “now listen here you crazy psycho, I’m not your dolly and you can’t just kidnap me, now let me go or else-“ she responds by shoving a pacifier in your mouth and says “oh that won’t be happening, you’re gonna be my new dolly whether you like it or not, no ifs or buts about it” she proceeds to tie a ribbon around the pacifier so you cannot spit it out, shoves you into her backpack and continues walking home.

Eventually she arrives home and takes you out of the backpack, your in elmyra’s bedroom, half of it seems like the bedroom of a typical 12 year old girl but the other half was almost like a nursery, complete with a crib, changing table and a high chair, among other things.

She lays you down on the changing table and says “time to put mr hippity hops into something a bit more cuter” she then proceeds to undress you, put a thick princess diaper on you and dress you in a puffy pink dress and a matching pink bonnet, she picks you up and says “ok bunny wunny, now it’s going to be
1.title: You are captured

choices: A green veggie smoothie in a large baby bottle
11.content:
Elmyra sets you down into the high chair and puts a bib on you that reads I hop with joy at the first sight of food “Mr bunny wunny must be hungry wungry, well don’t you worry about a thing, mommy made something very special just for you, and if you eat it all I’ve made a yummy surprise for you.

As elmyra leaves you immediately try to escape the chair, with all your strength you manage to lift yourself out of the chair but suddenly she walks back in holding a a large bowl of slimy green mush and a spoon, she sets them down and suddenly grabs you and lays you on her lap “mr hippity hops has been a bad baby, now mommy has to punish you” she proceeds to pull up the bottom of your dress exposing your diaper, pull down your diaper revealing your bare butt, and spank you for 20 minutes straight.

After settling your back into the chair she pulls out a roll of duct tape and says “now mommy needs to make sure that bunny wunny doesn’t try to escape again” after about 5 minutes of elmyra ripping tape and you struggling against it she steps back and admires her handiwork. Your wrists were restrained to the tray, your ankles were restrained to bottom part of the seat, your entire chest was restrained to the back of the seat and your forehead was restrained to the headrest of the seat.

Elmyra brings the bowl and spoon from earlier and puts it down on the tray and starts stirring it “bunny wunny needs to eat his veggie weggies, especially his green veggie weggies”.

“Ok my wittle itty bitty baby bunny wunny, here comes the yum yum train, right into the station, toot toot, yum yum express coming through, toot toot, next stop tummyland” says elmyra as she puts the food in your mouth, “good job mr hippity hop, but we’re not done yet, there’s many more trips that the yum yum express needs to make to tummyland”.

The mush tastes vile but under fear of punishment you finish the entire bowl as elmyra removes the tape over your wrists and removes the bowl and says “well done baby, now you can get my special surprise”

She walks away and returns with
11.title: Feeding time

112.content:
Elmyra returns with a large mudpie the size of your head with about 3 giant worms sticking out of it “now eat your mudpie and I’ll change your diaper”. You push the mudpie slightly away and turn your head as elmyra says “aww, is bunny wunny having trouble with his mudpie, here, let momma help”.

Elmyra scoops up the entire mudpie onto a spoon and shoves it into your mouth, she presses your cheeks together forcing you to swallow it, she unstraps you and removes your from the high chair, picks you up and sniffs your diaper “uh oh, smells like mr hippity hops has made a stinky winky in his diapey wipey” she lets out a small laugh and says “time to change your diaper” she proceeds to lay you down on the changing table, undresses you, cleans you up and puts a fresh diaper.

“Ok bunny wunny, now we’re gonna play”
112.title: A large mudpie

info.brief_description: Elmyra kidnaps buster bunny in order to make him her new baby doll
info.description:
Rules:

No sex

No death

Story is told from buster’s POV

Note: in this story elmyra is a super smart inventor and loves playing with baby dolls
info.pretty_title: Tiny toon adventures: elmyra’s new pet
